summary: In this context, 1,1,2-trichloroethene (TCE) is mentioned in relation to soil and tree core sampling for hydrocarbon volatile organic carbon analysis, while the NR3C1 gene, which encodes the glucocorticoid receptor, is not discussed. There is no direct or indirect relationship established between TCE and the NR3C1 gene in the provided context, indicating they are unrelated in this study.
